title: What part of "Melee Only" is so hard?
body:
If I had a win for every time I've seen an ADC take flesheater in Black Market Brawlers, I could leave the god-forsaken mode and be content with the shiny little icons.

Tl;dr- Flesheater is melee only, Mr. Quinn Jungle.

Edit: New game modes make people unable to read.

Mirage blade teleports you AWAY from the target.

Typhoon claws passive is the same name as sated devourer. So don't take both.

>

i admit to being guilty of this the first time playing that mode. its a crap item even on melees tho so...

> [{quoted}](name=Hallows Evelynn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iMAPTnTe,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-08-07T00:04:21.448+0000)
>
> i admit to being guilty of this the first time playing that mode. its a crap item even on melees tho so...

Xin Zhao, Olaf and Trynd top all like to thank you for buying ironbacks early. It makes it MUCH easier to get 5 hits in without clearing the wave.

Also Darius, Renekton, and Aatrox. I carried a game with Flesheater Aatrox.

Yes. Carried. With Aatrox.
I took Flesheater as Nasus against Teemo.  I could farm to my hearts content simply because I got a MASSIVE amount of sustain from my passive + Flesheater.
try Renekton Flesheater+Trickster+Dead Man plate
If melee-only were an easy concept to understand, we wouldn't get so many threads reporting Thresh being unable to execute minions with Relic Shield as a bug.

Wait, we still get those?

I thought the Thresh reports ended at least several months ago...

Well some people don't think the time investment to get good is worth it.   A lot that are interested and want to get into competitive play might be reluctant to as well because their cliques don't like it/don't play video games in general.  Others still just don't think they'll ever have the dexterity in their fingers to become "pro", and most people have only played a match or two of it and think they're the best.

Of course Super Smash Bros. Melee is an amazing game, competitive or no.  But Brawl and SSB4 aren't bad, they're just  overall less addictive, or so statistics have been saying for all these years.

~melee4lyfe~

> [{quoted}](name=Dingding123,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iMAPTnTe,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-08-07T01:58:21.762+0000)

> ~melee4lyfe~

This guy.
Obviously it was for Valor form. /s
This is the same logic Rito likes seeing as they made GP's gun melee and Kayle's sword ranged.
be honest, do you really want to see kayle's build hydra?
You prefer Kayle building Runaan's?

runaans honestly isn't that bad(I'd muchly prefer wits end tbh). It's only really strong in a tight team cluster, if your team focuses on picks and/or split pushing, kayle will not get as much out of the item.

Not to mention runaans doesn't give any inherent dmg that kayle doesn't already have, it just spreads it to 2 extra targets. AD Kayle used to be a thing a while back, with static shiv, IE and whatnot. Just imagin that with a tiamat, she'd be an unstoppable split pusher that way with her super wave clear, kiting, and tower taking abilities.

Um... Quinn is melee with her ultimate, so you can't be mad at the Quinn who buys it.
Not for buying it, at least.
You're free to be mad that the Quinn both: A. is going jungle and B. Is planning on using her ultimate for actual combat.

> [{quoted}](name=DeceasedL0ved0ne,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iMAPTnTe,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-08-07T06:36:54.615+0000)
>
> Um... Quinn is melee with her ultimate, so you can't be mad at the Quinn who buys it.
> Not for buying it, at least.
> You're free to be mad that the Quinn both: A. is going jungle and B. Is planning on using her ultimate for actual combat.

Quinn jungle works, Valor is used into combat and if you go bruiser, which works, you can even use it to teamfight.

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iMAPTnTe,comment-id=00140000,timestamp=2015-08-07T12:34:25.938+0000)
>
> Quinn jungle works, Valor is used into combat and if you go bruiser, which works, you can even use it to teamfight.

Works.

You use that word but I don't think it means the same thing as what you want it to mean. 

Surviving in the jungle doesn't make a champion 'work' as a jungler. If their only pressure is coming out and being ignored, it isn't 'working'.
You clearly underestimate the power of a vault.
I missed the (melee only) thing, so i just sold it when i realized it was melee only.

Yup, same.
I don't usually read the *name* of the items, I read the description, and it's not mentioned anywhere there.  It's only in the name.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/XFTF9bO5-when-you-start-a-feature-game-mode

I feel your pain.

I think it's just the lower 50% of the ranked population trying to get icons. 

The bronze is quite evident and its really messed up that their feeding affects your lanes since buff-ass brawlers come out of the cut at 8 minutes.

I'd like to call bullshit on saying bad people are bad but...
I can't after my last few games- I really can't.

One game
Enemy {{champion:114}}  Jungle: "This is so stupid! Stun after stun- I can't do anything!"
Us {{champion:90}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:22}} "That's a shame."

Last game
The enemy {{champion:67}}  literally flashed over the wall to steal the Krugs from the {{champion:105}} Jungle and then he chased her while our {{champion:245}}  simply walked down to cut her off for a First Blood at like 2:10.
With some {{champion:267}} assistance of course, never let it be said I don't help a brother fish out.

> Enemy {{champion:114}}  Jungle: "This is so stupid! Stun after stun- I can't do anything!"
> Us {{champion:90}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:22}} "That's a shame."

I probably shouldn't laugh.
But that's just funny.
I laughed, I was the Malzahar :D

I'm not even sure where the complaint would come from.
Maz has a suppression on ult - not a stun.
Ashe has stun on Ult - Fiora can ripost it now (unless I'm mistaken).
Braum has it on passive with a giant warning ram.
With a mercurial scimitar and good reflexes, she could easily ignore 2 of them. (thougb admittedly, mercury works funny with Braum's passive, since the stacks [and cooldown] are coded as debuffs.)

Welllll she complained loudest when she ganked my lane just as the support Braum was roaming near mid.
I silenced her and threw some vision at her before flashing the hell away so she couldn't stick to me.
(Had absolutely zero armor and was slowly getting poked down by a Xerath- did not want to mess with that when I only had 1/4 of my health) 
Braum walked up and ulted to knock her up. 
He kept her off me while I panicked near my turret for a second than ran up to trigger Braum's passive.
And then I ulted her- she did not like that.
Put together it probably was about 6 or 7 seconds solid seconds of her not being able to do anything.

She did get a QSS towards the end, damned if I noticed her use it though.

> With some {{champion:267}} assistance of course, never let it be said I don't help a brother fish out.

I don't know WHERE these people come from, but they make me feel happier about slowly climbing out of gold 5. At least people buy the proper items to do what they need to do there... Sometimes.

cough bloodthirster rush on miss fortune cause I haven't played this champ in 3 seasons cough

im not a great ADC, but i bloodthirster rush a lot of my ADCs. I mean, you basically need a BF item, Zeal item, and Last Whisper to do damage at 30 minutes. if you go IE, PD, then Bloodthirster, you cant cut through a tank (if they have one). 

The pros generally go IE, PD/Shiv, Last Whisper. I personally find getting lifesteal 35 minutes in the game is too late. I kinda need the lifesteal earlier, especially since they nerfed the LS runes. 3% lifesteal +70 health from a dorans blade isnt enough survivability.

As I understand it (ADC being my weakest position)
Need a BF item first so you can do damage enough to farm.
Need an AS item second so you can farm and fight.
Need an armor pen item third so you can take towers and be any sort of threat to tanks.

I still can't express how surprised I was when I saw the level 1 Vayne flash over the wall to steal the krug from Fizz; and we had vision of the other lanes so we knew she was alone. "That girl _wants_ to** die**."

> [{quoted}](name=Frekvin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iMAPTnTe,comment-id=00040000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-07T04:56:40.663+0000)

> 
> I still can't express how surprised I was when I saw the level 1 Vayne flash over the wall to steal the krug from Fizz; and we had vision of the other lanes so we knew she was alone. "That girl _wants_ to** die**."

Armor pen doesn't work on towers.

TO BE PERFECTLY FAIR...

If the champion changes form, they MIGHT be able to make use of flesheater.

But still, bad idea unless you can swap at will (nid/jayce)
I've always had questions like this for someone like Jayce or Gnar. Both have the ability to transform, so if you get say a "melee only" item, does it only work in one form? Or not at all?
It works in their melee form.
Have yorick on your team. Have yorick ult quinn. Have quinn die. Have quinn ult while "dead". Congrats, you now have a permanent Valor.

> [{quoted}](name=7ha7guy777,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iMAPTnTe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-06T20:08:50.119+0000)
>
> Have yorick on your team. Have yorick ult quinn. Have quinn die. Have quinn ult while "dead". Congrats, you now have a permanent Valor.

Wait...

Is that a real bug?

> [{quoted}](name=7ha7guy777,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iMAPTnTe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-06T20:08:50.119+0000)
>
> Have yorick on your team. Have yorick ult quinn. Have quinn die. Have quinn ult while "dead". Congrats, you now have a permanent Valor.

What
Is this a real bug?
its beacause only the passive/active (im not sure which one) are melee only?
Both are. It's like building Hydra on a ranged champ.
but you also still get the life steal and ad from the item itself
Yes, but why have a Hydra when you could have a Bloodthirster?

beacuse hydra may be better for that chamipon?
 or you may just like the item?

Um... It's literally impossible for Hydra to be a better pick than Bloodthirster on a ranged champion. Numbers time.

Hydra: 75 AD, 12% lifesteal, 100% base health regen. Passive/active do not proc on ranged attacks.
Bloodthirster: 80 AD, 20% lifesteal, bonus lifesteal as a shield.

5 more AD, a shield, and 8% more lifesteal for only 200 more gold. There's no contest there. The lifesteal far outweighs the regen from Hydra, and the shield passive is worth more than enough on its own.

Honestly I had no idea Fleasheater is melee only.

On the other hand I never bought it and already got the icon.

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iMAPTnTe,comment-id=001c,timestamp=2015-08-07T19:09:50.524+0000)
>
> Honestly I had no idea Fleasheater is melee only.
> 
> On the other hand I never bought it and already got the icon.

There are many like you.

I did however buy both Devourer and Typhoon Claws.

Despite passives being unique I was wondering what that means in this case, since they are both so different.
Plus, by then the game was decided and all I could do with them were 3 camps in the jungle. :P
영어 OP. Murca. Cuz we don't want to know how to engrish

> [{quoted}](name=Rip Fiora 2015,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iMAPTnTe,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-08-06T20:03:47.624+0000)

> 
> Edit: New game modes make people unable to read.

> Mirage blade teleports you AWAY from the target.
> 
> Typhoon claws passive is the same name as sated devourer. So don't take both.

The mirage blade description is just weird.
It says it teleports you 350 units away from the target. Alright. I attack with 550 attack range and the opposing champion doesn't move. Why do I still move away from the target if I'm already more than 350 units away?

It's just confusing because it sounds like it's teleporting u so that you're 350 units away from the target, aka moving closer.
